name: Tale of Twilight
description:
A treasure hunter wanders into an abandoned stronghold. Ignoring all warnings about the curse that lies on his terrible place, he searches for loot. Find the lost treasure and gold that is scattered throughout the grounds. Solve puzzles and slay the monsters that are haunting this castle. Discover the secrets of this frightening place, or at least try and escape with your life.

Install Instructions: 

1. Unzip contents of TaleOfTwilight.zip 

2. Run TaleOfTwilight.exe

Created By:

Joseph Davis!!! Of GreenMonkey Productions
